transcript.title: PM 93/1962 - Dame Mary Gilmore
transcript.content:
The Commonwealth Government and the Goverrment of New South Wales jointly will accord a State Funeral to the late Dame Mary Gilmore.

Arrangements for the funeral have not yet been completed but details will be released as soon as they are available. 

The funeral is a recogition by both Governts of Dame Mary Gilmore's notable contibution to Australian life and literature. 

Canberra
3 December, 1962.
